sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"沉浸，浸入"之意。
means: immerse ： 侧重全部被液体所覆盖，也可用于比喻意义。
dip ： 指部分地、暂时地或轻微地放进液体，多暗示一种谨慎或试探性的动作。
duck ： 指把头伸进水中，或指游泳时开玩笑地把一个人的头按入水中。
plunge ： 暗示迅速而有力的动作，但浸入不一定很深。
submerge ： 指长时间的完全浸入、潜入，强调浸入液体深层。

sentence.Network_en: Immerse the cloth in the dye for twenty minutes.
I immerse my clothes in the water.
Don't immerse yourself in the infliction too long.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要长时间沉浸在痛苦经历中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... merge v 合并，融合（沉下→融为一体→合并） immerse v 沉浸 submersion n 沉没.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... sparse 稀少的，贫乏的 immerse 浸入，沉浸于 intersperse 散布，点缀.
六级高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... ignite v. 引燃 95-1-67 99-6-36 immerse v. 使浸没 01-6-51 impose v. 把……强加于 89-1-57 93-6-67.
NK-words2 - 博客的日志 - 网易博客 ... imaginary 想象的，虚构的 immerse 使沉浸在；使浸没 impart 传授，给予；告知，通知.

list.abs: 由于在双重曝光中使用沉浸式光刻（immersion lithography），ASML排名从第三位上升到第二位，市场份额增长到13%。尽管东京电 …

immersion needle 振动针immersion vibrator 插入式振捣器impact 冲击碰撞
...immersible concrete vibrator 插入式混凝土振捣器immersible pump 潜水泵immersing heater 沉浸式加热器

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin immers- 'dipped into', from the verb immergere, from in- 'in' + mergere 'to dip'

entry.tran: 使沉浸(于);使专心(于);使深陷(于)
entry.def: If you immerse yourself in something that you are doing, you become completely involved in it.

example.ex: Since then I've lived alone and immersed myself in my career.
example.tran: 自那以后,我一直一个人生活,全身心投入我的事业当中。

entry.def: If something is immersed in a liquid, someone puts it into the liquid so that it is completely covered.

example.ex: The electrodes are immersed in liquid.

means.word_mean: 3. enclose or envelop completely, as if by swallowing;

sentences.sentence: "The huge waves swallowed the small boat and it sank shortly thereafter"
"The professor plunged his students into the study of the Italian text"

auth_sentence.content: Photos Immerse yourself in incredible photography from Reading and Leeds.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Photos Immerse yourself in incredible photography from Reading and Leeds.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生长水中的,浸没的,淹没的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面+mers沉,没+ed……的→adj.生长水中的,浸没的,淹没的
e出+mers沉,没+ion表名词→沉下有出现→浮现
sub在下面+mers沉,没+ion表名词→submerge的名词

sentences.en: He immersed himself totally in his work.

means.word_mean: 使沉浸于; 使深陷于；深陷于，沉浸在

sentences.en: He immersed himself totally in his work.

jushi.english: The teacher immerses among the students.
jushi.chinese: 这位教师能和学生打成一片。
